titleStmt.title: Faultes faults, and nothing else but faultes
titleStmt.author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for Ieffrey Chorleton, and are to be sold at the great north doore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: First word of title is xylographic.
Running title reads: Faults, and nothing but faults.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the great north doore of Paules Church
